text: Bachman–Turner Overdrive are a Canadian rock band from Winnipeg, Manitoba. Bachman–Turner Overdrive have five members in the band; the current band members are Fred Turner, Randy Bachman, Mick Dalla Vee, Marc LaFrance and Brent Howard. Two of the band's best known songs are "You Ain't Seen Nothing Yet" and "Takin' Care of Business". Their song "Takin' Care of Business" was ranked #10 in top 100 most covered songs by Guitar Magazine. The band was formed in 1971. They released their self-titled first album on August 30, 1989. Fans of the bands are usually known as "gearheads". They have won many Juno Awards as well. == Discography == ===Studio albums=== *Bachman–Turner Overdrive (1973) *Bachman–Turner Overdrive II (1973) *Not Fragile (1974) *Four Wheel Drive (1975) *Head On (1975) *Freeways (1977) *Street Action (1978) *Rock n' Roll Nights (1979) *Bachman–Turner Overdrive (1984) *Trial by Fire: Greatest and Latest (1996) *Bachman & Turner (2010) ==References== == Other websites == *Official website Category:1970s music groups Category:1980s music groups Category:1990s music groups Category:2000s music groups Category:2010s music groups Category:Canadian hard rock bands Category:Canadian rock bands Category:Organizations based in Winnipeg Category:Musical groups established in 1973 Category:1973 establishments in Canada Category:1980s disestablishments in Canada Category:Musical groups established in 1983 Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2005 Category:2000s disestablishments in Canada Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2004 Category:1980 disestablishments
title: Bachman–Turner Overdrive
